message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you $400,000, and I'll take $600,000. What do you say?
I'll give you a smaller share this time, but I think this is a reasonable compromise.
I'll give you a slightly larger share this time. I think this is a fair compromise considering the reduced value of the money.
I'm willing to give you a small share, but I want to keep the majority of the money.
I'm trying to find a balance between giving you a decent share and keeping a reasonable amount for myself. This is my best offer so far.
I'm getting closer to what I want, but I'm willing to give you a tiny share if you're willing to give me most of the money.
I'm getting close to my minimum, but I'm still trying to find a balance. This is my last reasonable offer.
I'm not budging much more. This is my final offer.
This is my last offer. I'm not willing to give up more than this. Take it or leave it.
